item.title: Becastled
item.description:
Title: Becastled
Genre: Indie , Strategy
Developer: Mana Potion Studios
Publisher: Mana Potion Studios , Pingle Studio Ltd
Release Date: Oct 22, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Feb 8, 2021




About This Game

Becastled is a cozy-meets-challenging strategy game that combines city building with RTS-like tower defense. You are the lord of the Sun Kingdom, leading its final stand against the Moon Beasts.

Design and build your castle, grow a settlement, and prepare your people for the nightly siege. By day, gather resources, place buildings, raise walls, and lay roads, keeping your subjects happy with taverns and decorations. By night, man the battlements, unleash ballistas, and hold the line until dawn.

The siege horns sound at sunset. How long can your fortress hold the dark?

BUILD A CASTLE BY DAY

Transform a humble village into a true medieval city. Lay farms and markets to keep your people fed, gather wood and iron for construction, and raise walls, watchtowers, and gates to protect your keep. Build a fantasy bastion where life flourishes under the sun!

KEEP YOUR PEOPLE HAPPY

Satisfied subjects work harder and fight with greater courage. Sawmills may sour the air, but lively taverns and street decorations lift every spirit. Balance comfort and function to keep your kingdom strong through each long night.

DEFEND AGAINST SIEGES AT NIGHT

At sunset, the Moon Beasts strike with battering rams, siege towers and even dragons. Layer your defenses with walls and iron gates, rain fire with catapults and archers, and withstand ever-stronger assaults until sunrise.

TRAIN AN UNSTOPPABLE ARMY

Forge weapons and armor to prepare your warriors for the siege. Advance from basic infantry to an army with ballistas and trebuchets. Archers, swordsmen, and pikemen will fight to the last if you train and equip them well. If the walls fall, rally every villager to defend their home.

TURN THE LAND TO YOUR ADVANTAGE

Hills, rivers, and forests can be your castle’s best allies, offering natural moats and tactical positions. But shifting seasons can betray you. A river shields you in summer but freezes solid in winter, creating a bridge for your enemy. Adapt your defenses and stockpile resources ahead of time.

BUILD, DEFEND, EXPAND, REPEAT

A strong economy fuels a stronger army. Grow your domain, claim new lands, and mine precious Sunstone to raise buildings and keep your people safe.

As your settlement expands, you will push back the forces of the night. But will you have the strength to end the ancient war between the Sunfolk and the creatures of the Moon?

About This Game

From the writers & directors of Tales from the Borderlands and The Wolf Among Us ,
Dispatch is a superhero workplace comedy set in modern day Los Angeles.

You play as Robert Robertson, AKA Mecha Man, whose mech-suit is destroyed in a battle against his nemesis, forcing him to take a job at a superhero dispatch center: not as a hero, but a dispatcher. In charge of rehabilitating a group of ex-supervillains, you must manage your roster while navigating office relationships and rebuilding your suit for a shot at revenge.

In Dispatch , every decision you make influences the unfolding narrative. From banter in the breakroom to life-or-death situations in the field, your choices affect your relationships with the heroes, their allegiances, and the path your own story takes.

Use the strategy map to review ongoing emergencies and deploy the right (or wrong) heroes to deal with them. Balance the risks and rewards as you make tactical decisions, knowing that each choice can have lasting consequences for your team and the city.

Managing heroes sometimes goes beyond their powers. Each hero comes with quirks, flaws, and baggage you’ll need to navigate to keep the team together. Upgrade their skills and unlock abilities to boost their effectiveness in the field.

Blending narrative, strategy, and humor, Dispatch explores what it means to be a hero, whether you're wearing a cape or behind a desk.

item.title: Relic Guardian - Tower Defense
item.description:
Title: Relic Guardian - Tower Defense
Genre: Adventure , Casual , Indie , RPG , Strategy
Developer: Mystrigger
Publisher: Mystrigger , XD
Release Date: Oct 22, 2025




About This Game

Stunning pixel art tower defense game

Take on the role of the summoned hero——"Fran", and embark on an epic and fantastical journey of guardianship.

Move and Build

Fran has the ability to use Wish Power to shrink bulky defense towers into portable forms and rearrange them on the battlefield.

Various Defense Towers

The five humble Whicken tribe warriors can be empowered and transformed into 15 different advanced Spirit Towers, resurrecting the glory of past battlefields!

Unlock Various Tower Forms Through Challenges

In the face of diverse threats, new tower forms help you tackle new enemies!

Fight with Pani

Fight alongside the Whicken tribe's powerful Priestess, Pani. She can transform into various heroic forms and unleash powers capable of turning the tide of battle!

Dangerous Creatures

The Vortex Island is inhabited by a variety of fantastical creatures. Perhaps some of them can become your allies as well?

A fantasy journey awaits

· Embark on a challenge through 5 themed areas with over 20 levels.

· Face a multitude of menacing enemies, ready to shred your defenses.

· Thrilling and intense boss battles will pose the greatest obstacles on your journey.

· Pani, with her 9 different forms, is your most reliable companion in adventure and battle, although she has a temper.

· Mysterious sculptor Gigi will provide you with dozens of upgrade options to make your team even more powerful.

· You won't be alone on this continent, as there are many allies ready to lend you a helping hand.

item.title: Refate: Echoes of Desire
item.description:
Title: Refate: Echoes of Desire
Genre: Adventure , Casual , Indie , RPG , Simulation
Developer: Terraflame Entertainment
Publisher: Mountain and Sea Studio , Terraflame Entertainment
Release Date: Oct 22, 2025




About This Game

The first immersive interactive movie game with a Yakuza theme.

As the first-person perspective scans the neon lights of a foreign city, your story begins with a "brutal starting blow".

——ReFATE：Echoes of Desire

You open your eyes to an unfamiliar street scene, your pockets emptier than your mind—it's like someone hit the "delete" button on your memories. Survival is your only immediate KPI, but trouble always arrives faster than opportunities:

Shadows flicker in the dim light, gang members chase you with a urgency that outpaces your heartbeat. Don't panic. Staying alive is the first key to unlocking "who I am".

Starting penniless and amnesiac on the streets of Tokyo, you will journey step by step to the city's pinnacle. Money, beauties, and power will all become byproducts of your search for the truth.

[Special Note]

Major Premiere! Complete romance routes for 8 female protagonists!

[Game Features]

[First-Person Immersive Yakuza Survival Play]

Filmed with real Tokyo landmarks, includes "you-know-what" style easter egg scenes, featuring detailed performances by local popular actresses and seasoned actors. This first-person immersive Yakuza survival challenge, starting from the Tokyo streets, is officially beginning. You're not watching a story; you're telling your own.

[Meaty QTE that Makes Your "Heartbeat" Tangible]

Action QTEs that blend seamlessly with the live-action footage, turning a "racing heartbeat" into a playable rhythm. A tap of your finger might just switch you from a "dead-end scenario" to an "awesome storyline". Every interaction is a deep connection with the story.

[Length + Rewards: Generous Volume]

The game includes over 7 hours of live-action footage and 8 beautiful heroines with different charms and personalities. Whether it's length or... rewards, we offer generous volume.

The noble and cold Yakuza boss lady

The gentle and caring innocent international student

The quirky and mischievous little devil rich heiress

The lonely divorced teacher with a child

The vibrant and righteous policewoman

The dangerous,well-proportioned female ninja

The enchanting top-tier gravure model

The sexy and passionate restaurant owner

[Suspense + Romance, the 'Chrysanthemum and the Sword']

One moment you're lingering in tender ambiguity, the next you're gasping, "Who stabbed me in the back?!"

[High-Intensity Narrative + Highly Interactive Gameplay]

A professional production team delivers full cinematic quality. The suspenseful puzzle-solving will keep you focused, while the tense action sequences ensure the story's pace is perfectly balanced.

[Endings Feature Interwoven "Dream Crossovers"]

Dozens of branches lead to N types of lives. Among the dozen or so endings lie interconnected easter eggs. The more memory fragments you collect, the more you can uncover the hidden plot behind the main story—even the endings themselves interact and intertwine.

[Interaction is More Than Just "Choose A or B"]

During investigation phases, details that can turn the tide are hidden within the scenes—graffiti on a street corner, a special mark in a drawer, a seemingly ordinary diary... any could be the code to break the case.

[Find Your Past, Piece Together Memories, Win Big or Restart—The Choice is Yours]

On the path to discovering your history, memory fragments are like puzzles scattered throughout the plot. As you piece them together, you encounter the "so-this-is-how-crazy-I-was" version of yourself. Just dive in and make your choices. Choose right, and you win big in Tokyo. Choose wrong? Just hit restart—after all, a good story is never afraid of a few tries. Every restart is a new highlight moment.
